title: Implementing K-Means Clustering in JavaScript
description: In this lab, we will explore the k-means clustering algorithm in JavaScript. The purpose of this lab is to learn how to group data into k clusters based on similarity, using the k-means algorithm. We will implement the algorithm step-by-step and apply it to a sample dataset to understand how it works.

meta.title: K-Means Clustering | JavaScript Programming | Data Science
meta.description: Learn how to implement the k-means clustering algorithm in JavaScript, a powerful technique for grouping data into similar clusters. Explore step-by-step implementation and apply it to a sample dataset.
meta.keywords: k-means clustering, JavaScript, data science, programming, machine learning, data analysis

verify.name: Verify Node Commands in ZSH History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 在JavaScript中实现K均值聚类
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索JavaScript中的k均值聚类算法。本实验的目的是学习如何使用k均值算法根据相似性将数据分组为k个聚类。我们将逐步实现该算法，并将其应用于一个示例数据集，以了解它是如何工作的。

meta.title: K均值聚类 | JavaScript编程 | 数据科学
meta.description: 学习如何在JavaScript中实现k均值聚类算法，这是一种将数据分组为相似聚类的强大技术。探索逐步实现过程并将其应用于示例数据集。
meta.keywords: k均值聚类, JavaScript, 数据科学, 编程, 机器学习, 数据分析

verify.name: 在ZSH历史记录中验证Node命令
verify.hint: 通过在终端/SSH中输入'node'并按回车键，可以运行JavaScript。
